input.title: [AZ-003] Key Vault 'ai-empire-vault-01' has open network access
input.body:
## Issue Description
High severity risk: Key Vault 'ai-empire-vault-01' has open network access, potentially exposing sensitive data.

### Recommended Fix
- Restrict network access to the Key Vault using Azure Private Link or firewall rules.
- Ensure only authorized IPs or VNets can access it.

Module: Azure

Please assign to DevOps team for manual resolution.

input.body:

Please assign to DevOps team for manual resolution.

input.title: [AZ-004] AI service 'ai-empire-openai-australiaeast' has public network access
input.body:
## Issue Description
Medium severity risk: AI service 'ai-empire-openai-australiaeast' has public network access, increasing exposure to unauthorized access.

### Recommended Fix
- Disable public network access and use private endpoints or VNet integration.

Module: Azure

Please assign to DevOps team for manual resolution.

input.title: [GH-001] GitHub Repository is Public
input.body:
## Issue Description
High severity risk: The GitHub repository is set to public, exposing source code and potentially sensitive information.

### Recommended Fix
- Change the repository visibility to private.
- Review and remove any sensitive data if already exposed.

Module: GitHub

Please assign to DevOps team for manual resolution.

input.content:
## Azure Key Vault Open Network Access (AZ-003)

### Root Cause
Key Vaults configured with open network access allow connections from any IP, risking unauthorized access to secrets.

### Repair Strategy
- Difficulty: High
- Use Azure CLI or Portal to set network ACLs to 'Deny' and allow specific IPs/VNets.
- Example CLI: az keyvault network-rule add --name <vault> --ip-address <ip>
- Note: Automated repair not possible with current tools; marked as pending for manual fix.

## Azure AI Services Public Network Access (AZ-004)

### Root Cause
AI services with public network access enabled are exposed to the internet.

### Repair Strategy
- Difficulty: Medium
- Disable public access via Azure Portal or CLI: az cognitiveservices account update --name <account> --public-network-access Disabled
- Integrate with VNet for private access.
- Note: Automated repair not possible; marked as pending.

## Lessons Learned
- Tool limitations prevent direct Azure modifications and GitHub issue creation.
- Future: Request expanded tool permissions for Azure updates and GitHub integrations.

## GitHub Repository Public Visibility (GH-001)

### Root Cause
Repository set to public exposes source code and potential sensitive information to anyone.

### Repair Strategy
- Difficulty: High
- Change visibility to private via GitHub settings.
- Review for sensitive data leaks.
- Note: Unable to create tracking issue due to 403 errors; marked as pending for manual fix.

## Lessons Learned
- Integration permissions need verification for GitHub API access.
